name: Donna, Appellant, v. Abbotts Dairies, Incorporated

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Bok and Eagen, JJ.
parties: Donna, Appellant, v. Abbotts Dairies, Incorporated.

opinions.text:
Opinion
per Curiam,
The order of the court below dismissing the plaintiffs’ complaint in mandamus is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Griffiths, reported in 20 Pa. D. & C. 2d 463.
opinions.author: per Curiam,

attorneys: Rutledge Slattery, with him Andrew Mutch Knowlton, Daniel B. Michie, Jr., Frank Slattery, and Fell & Spaulding, for appellants.
Arthur Littleton, with him Henry T. Reath, Claude C. Smith, and Duane, Morris & Heckscher, and Morgan, Lewis <£ Bockius, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Donna, Appellant, v. Abbotts Dairies, Incorporated.
Argued April 19, 1960.
Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Bok and Eagen, JJ.
Rutledge Slattery, with him Andrew Mutch Knowlton, Daniel B. Michie, Jr., Frank Slattery, and Fell & Spaulding, for appellants.
Arthur Littleton, with him Henry T. Reath, Claude C. Smith, and Duane, Morris & Heckscher, and Morgan, Lewis <£ Bockius, for appellees.
May 23, 1960:
